Text.Page:
Deep within the Witch-Queen Catacombs, {@LinkCreature:22#21#chaos guides} and their {@LinkCreature:22#22#iskaragards} are working against us.

My sisters must be stopped. They'll know our tactics best, so I must ask you to face them.

All I ask is that when we've settled this wretched affair, we understand how this happened and who ordered it.

Understanding will help me heal and knowing who's responsible will give the surviving witches someone to kill. Slowly.
